description: The Box Island Trail is a 2.8 km hike in Vancouver Island's Pacific Rim National Park. As a short and relatively easy trail, this scenic hike leads you through lush rainforests and over gentle meandering streams before arriving at a spectacular beachfront area. If you hike at low tide, you can walk onto and across Box Island for a beautiful view out to the Pacific Ocean.
directions: About 15 km south from Tofino, at N49° 04.460' W125° 47.088'
title: Tofino area Box Island hike
